alert.note: Alert for Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:16PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Kenedy and western Willacy Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 216 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Perlita High School, or near Raymondville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raymondville, Lyford, San Perlita, Reber Memorial Library, Raymondville High School, Raymondville Police Department, Willamar, Yturria, Lyford Elementary School and Lyford City Hall. This includes the following highways... Interstate Highway 69 E between mile markers 41 and 51. US Highway 77 between mile markers 758 and 762. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
